overview: A man and his brother on a mission of revenge become trapped in a harrowing occult experiment dating back to the Third Reich.
tagline: In the 1930s, Adolf Hitler believed the occult held the secret to immortality. Almost a century later, the nightmare has awakened.
cast: Dominic Purcell|Henry Cavill|Michael Fassbender|Emma Booth|Rainer Winkelvoss
